name: Captar Partners
description: Captar support to businesses in need of hiring is comprehensive, from developing a full report and market-mapping service through to successful delivery and on-boarding. Working across the Hong Kong and Singapore markets, we work very closely with clients to discuss project needs and source the hard-to-find candidates they need to expand their business.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: To provide a one-stop premium talent solution to our clients and candidates
ShortDescription: Captar Partners is a world class recruitment service provider across multi-disciplinary with leading by seasoned and specialized headhunters in the market.
enhanced_description: Captar Partners is a world-class recruitment service provider offering a one-stop premium talent solution to clients and candidates. Their comprehensive support for businesses in need of hiring spans from developing full reports and market-mapping services through to successful delivery and candidate on-boarding. Specializing in sourcing hard-to-find candidates, they work closely with clients across the Hong Kong and Singapore markets. Their team comprises seasoned and specialized headhunters providing multi-disciplinary services, including interim employee placements, with specific expertise in the Crypto, Blockchain, and Financial markets.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive hiring support from report development to on-boarding
Deep market knowledge in Hong Kong and Singapore
Team of seasoned and specialized headhunters
Focus on boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Ability to hire top talent faster and more efficiently
Aims to reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees
World-class recruitment service across multi-disciplinary sectors
roi_benefits: More Efficient Hiring of Top Talent
Reduced Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
